001package org.biopax.validator.web.service;
002
003import org.biopax.validator.web.dto.Clue;
004import org.biopax.validator.web.dto.Xref;
005
006public interface Suggester {
007
008  /**
009   * Gets the preferred name for a synonym, non-standard or misspelled one.
010   * @param xrefDb bio data/identifiers collection name or synonym
011   * @return preferred name or null if none found
012   */
013  String getPrimaryDbName(String xrefDb);
014
015  /**
016   * Checks whether xrefs make sense and suggests preferred name, uri, namespace, etc.
017   * @param xrefs (optional) xref elements to check and suggest values; if empty,
018   * @return recommendation/validation result.
019   */
020  Clue xref(Xref[] xrefs);
021
022  /**
023   * Gets Identifiers.org URI (URL) for a bio entity record defined by db:id.
024   * @param db xref.db value (bio data/identifiers collection name)
025   * @param id xref.id value, an identifier, e.g., MI:0444, BMP2
026   * @return bio entity URI
027   * @throws IllegalArgumentException when db or id is invalid
028   */
029  String xrefDbIdToUri(String db, String id);
030
031}
